New Stat and 2 Player Platformer Mode

Cob Follow Jan 22, 2022 · news featured
Share

On January 20th of this new year, RobTop revealed a new stat in a Twitter thread, inspired by the hit game, "Super Mario Odyssey." RobTop states the following:

There's no time for Rhino Dragons when we are trying to choose the color for moons you collect in platformer mode. I like blue. Blue is nice.

This is showing that he is likely still deciding on which color to choose. Maybe the community will have a say in this new exciting stat.

Along with this, RobTop also previewed his new 2 player mode for the new exciting gamemode, "Platformer Mode." Despite it being a little confusing, the community will definitely master this new concept, and build amazing levels with it! Robtop also revealed some other not nearly as important features, such as a really cool warp transition trigger. The community is standing on it's tip toes, waiting for if the February 22nd, 2022 on Tuesday release will actually occur!
